topics.body:
Oh god I hate it whenever the show cuts to the guys at the baths...

I always feel uncomfortable during these segments.
[spoiler]Doesn't help that Yomoto was giving the Wombat a cleaning in a very suggestive way, and the Wombat was acting funny getting cleaned.[/spoiler]
[spoiler]And they _are_ naked while at the baths![/spoiler]

[spoiler]This isn't going to turn into some sort of yaoi hentai, right? 
[/spoiler]
...

Ehh, probably not that likely. 
But I'm watching you show. 
Always watching.
!http://37.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_kzyk6yXZSK1qb4x0go1_500.jpg!
